summary: Iteration 79: Table Consistency & Mobile-First Improvements - All tested features working correctly. AdminTableToolbar and TablePagination components verified on Wallet Overview, Wallet Transactions, All Students tabs. Mobile responsive column hiding works correctly (Email hidden <640px, Deposited/Spent hidden <768px). Bank Alerts tab correctly REMOVED from Wallet module.
passed_tests: Wallet Overview - AdminTableToolbar present with search, archive toggle, refresh, count badge
Wallet Overview - TablePagination present with page size selector (25), prev/next buttons, item count (1-23 of 23)
Wallet Overview - Mobile responsive: Email hidden on <640px, Deposited/Spent hidden on <768px
Wallet Transactions - AdminTableToolbar with search and type filter dropdown
Wallet Module - Bank Alerts tab correctly REMOVED (tabs: Overview, Transactions, Bank Info, Settings)
Orders (TextbookOrdersAdminTab) - Loads with search, filters, status dropdown
All Students (Todos los Estudiantes) - Pagination FOUND with 27 total students
critical_code_review_comments: AdminTableToolbar.jsx: Well-structured reusable component with proper data-testid attributes
TablePagination.jsx: Correctly hides when totalItems <= 10 (first pageSize option)
usePagination.js: Clean hook implementation with safePage to handle data changes
WalletOverviewTab.jsx: Properly uses shared components with responsive column classes (hidden sm:table-cell, hidden md:table-cell)
NOTE: InventoryTab.jsx with TablePagination is NOT being used in UnatiendaModule - the Inventory tab renders PrivateCatalogTab which has a custom inline-editable grid without pagination
seed_data_creation: No new seed data. Used existing data for testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Iteration 79 validated table consistency refactoring. Shared components (AdminTableToolbar, TablePagination, usePagination) working correctly on Wallet Overview, Wallet Transactions, All Students tabs. Bank Alerts tab removed from Wallet module (tabs: Overview, Transactions, Bank Info, Settings). Mobile responsive column hiding verified on Wallet Overview: Email hidden <640px, Deposited/Spent hidden <768px. Note: The InventoryTab.jsx with TablePagination is NOT used - UnatiendaModule's Inventory tab renders PrivateCatalogTab (a custom inline-editable grid without pagination).
